ESQUECE, se voce joga solo, desinstale o jogo agora mesmo

Revisitando o jogo por agora ja deu pra ver que ao inves de consertarem o jogo, só nerfaram os assassinos, entao a nao ser que vc adore perder tempo e passar raiva (se voce joga sozinho) fique longe... no caso com os amigos ainda da pra matar o tempo mas sei la.. investir nao..

EDIT 02/12/21

O jogo ta de graça na epic entao vai ter muitos jogadores novos, eu fiz 2 partidas hj e vou te falar... mais uma vez.. se vc joga de killer, só jogue com o ultimo killer lançado.. o resto se torna podre com o tempo.. caraca vey, eu jogava muito de nemesis(matava os 4 no gancho) e hoje ele nao consegue enganchar 1 dependendo do time.. que patetico.. Esse jogo é administrado com a bunda sem duvidas

EDIT 26/12;21

Este jogo é um lixo gostoso e viciante entao com varias resalvas, haja por sua conta em risco.. lembrando sempre de deixar o chat fechado.. eu sempre acabo voltando pra esta merda aqui
This is a great asymmetrical multiplayer game.

So, just as table card games have been refreshed by adding new takes on it with fantasy worlds , characters and new mechanics on them such as yugioh or heartstone being the top 2 that come in mind at the moment... i feel like Hide and Seek has been refreshed the same way by Dead by Daylight.

The replay value in this game is ridiculously big and you will most likely spend lots of time in it thanks to all the interesting combos you can do with perks and different characters. Playing both sides is enjoyable for their own reasons. Seeker ( Killer ) gets the enjoyement of spookin' the Hiders ( Survivors ) and Survivors get the thrill of escaping the danger just like an actual horror game.

HOWEVER. The enjoyement tends to diminish once you reach high ranks ( Purple-Red ranks ) and you don't use "Meta" Perks which in my opinion can get stale after a while. My suggestion is once you feel like it's too difficult for you , just wait 1-2 months for your rank to decrease and pick it up again.

Overall? 4/5 from me , they did a pretty good job so far :)

I can't even begin to describe how broken this game has become and that's coming from someone who used to love playing dbd. Ever since they did all these updates survivors have become extremely powerful to the point where the game is no longer fun on both sides of the spectrum ie nerfed dead hard, boon totems, decisive strike. You're literally punished for playing killer. Furthermore as killer you constantly get bullied because they treat you like a rat running in a wheel and encounter the worst kinds of people. The game has become completely unbalanced to the point where playing both sides feels like a chore instead of being fun. Every match people go to absolute insane lengths to try and break you instead of it being a good time for everyone it's "let's see how far we can push this person" by exhibiting the most toxic behavior especially in the endgame chat ie bullying, picking apart their strategy, saying they can't do this or that etc. You play good and get a 4k and get told you're trash and deserve to die but when survivors win then it's GG. Then people wonder why they play the way they do. From a survivor perspective the game has become stale and boring. The only objective is to fix generators and it's very repetitive. Maybe if they added other fun modes, side objectives etc it would be a better more balanced experience for everyone. But the developer said in an interview "if you find the game boring then don't play" rather than addressing the actual issues and listening to the community to improve gameplay. There are much better games out there to play this one just isn't fun anymore. Don't waste your time.
总是羡慕B站大佬们的蛇皮人皇步，第一次偶然成功使出，雀跃不已，在语音里芜湖起飞。总是恶心屠夫贴脸守尸，被遛了3台终于把讨厌的家伙挂上树，却发现节奏点就在于守与不守。来玩这款游戏吧，它跟生活一样能让你成长。
takes time to find a match but overall the game is a lot of fun if you like horror

it's a really fun game, and i enjoy it a lot, but the community is trash and the company has no idea how to price or monetize their game. you have to pay to unlock other characters and killers, which are key to unlocking perks which influence gameplay, effectively making this game, if not pay to win, then "pay to succeed", as many of the best perks are behind this paywall. in game currency is earned painfully slowly, and is not a viable method for unlocking all the characters, and therefore, unlocking these perks. this model would be acceptable if the game itself wasn't also fully priced. the cost of vanities are also severely inflated, and the things which can be re-skinned are fairly unimaginative. 

in addition, the game devs have poor balancing skills, and the game is in constant flux between being killer-sided and survivor-sided. certain issues which are commonly raised by the community, such as "Camping" and "Tunnelling" are considered by the dev's to be considered integral gameplay for those who choose to use these tactics. pile on that the game's matchmaking and ranking systems are severely broken, often pairing survivors with killers that are much too skilled at the game for those survivors to have a chance to experience much gameplay. 

all this contributes to the game being difficult and frustrating to the casual player, but immensely rewarding for players who wish to make this game one of their "main games" that they engage in daily or at least weekly, and are willing to invest several hundred dollars AFTER the initial game price to unlock all the content and possibly pick out some vanities for favorite characters.

I feel like the Killers have more Advantage specially with the DS being Nerf badly feel like the Killers need a bit of Changing atleast. Other than that the Game is Amazing I wish they added a Scorpion Style from Mortal Kombat for the DeathSlinger since he basically shoots a Hook that would be pretty badass.

Great game, have it on my Xbox as well. Can have it's ups and downs but it's all about keeping a mental positivity. If you go in thinking that you're "the stuff" you're gonna have a bad time. Learn the game, practice, have fun with it, and you will have a good time. Fair warning though, there will be tons of people that will exploit the game and make it very unfun for others *cough cough* killers. Camping and tunneling etc. But other than that the game is great especially with friends when playing as the survivors. Or playing as the horrifying and powerful killer. Great buy.

The game is almost like a "hate-love-relationship" where you love to play with teammates and hate to be on the hook by any killer or a s¤%ty team. As a killer, you perhapse have some satisfaction by murder survivors but also create a great strategy for you specific gameplay. Love that Be-havior collaborate with a lot companies in the horror genre. They call Dead By Daylight the hall of fame for horror fiction characters.

Most popular like Stranger Things, Silent Hill and now!!! Resident Evil. a classic if you ask me. Can't already wait to the next killer and patch is about to drop.

Can really recommend this game to many of you! Fun, addicitve, strategy based and fool a lot of killers if you play as a survivor. Love the comunity as well. Sad part is the long time queue in the lobby but you will get it sooner or later.

Would love to see more Cross-Platform with linked accounts so you dont miss your skins and special items.
